author: Jeremy T. Bouse
comment: Use this daily along with Integrated Timer. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the annoying crashes that happen, but that also happens with Ingress itself at a higher frequency.

Used to be my favorite watch face, but touching the screen now brings up an error message about how "android wear support is a new feature available to donators only." I don't even want the android wear support enabled. Please allow users to disable this! I even payed for the extension to allow custom logos already!

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: Touching the screen launches Integrated Timer on the watch. The message you see is the message from Integrated Timer, not the watch face itself. Maybe I should add an option to disable the launch of Integrated Timer when the watch face is touched.

title: Unwanted error message

author: Jaimi Gilray
comment: Love this watch face. Have tried many faces and this is always my first choice. Is there a way to disable the active points on the face. I keep launching the Ingress app on my watch by accident.
title: Awesome.

author: Jim Rasmussen
comment: Don't have an Android wear watch but I use it for the widget. No better watch widget for an Ingress player.
title: Great time widget

author: Jonathan Nassar
comment: The settings option seems to have disappeared. You can't change the watch face from the default view.
title: Settings?

author: Joe S
comment: This is a watchface for a smartwatch running the Android Wear os...don't have one myself but still looks cool.

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: The last update brings Android widgets, so it should be good for you.

title: Not an android app

author: Myke
comment: Love the simple design digital face. Low power consumption. And the ingress stuff looks cool too. Only two colors.
title: Great for everyday even if you don't ingress

author: Colin Ries
comment: The recent upgrades includes useful new features which I'll use when I have my smartwatch (currently I am using the widget). Good work agent.
title: Nice update

comment: DJ Karan Kumar
Among the watchfaces,I do like this one.

comment: Nice apps..

comment: Great app love it

author: Houssam Eltouny
comment: Love it
title: Amazing

author: Joshua Angeles
comment: Figured out how to change settings. First you have to open the settings by clicking on the widget in the homescreen. Lock your phone(make sure the widget is enabled) and select the widget. Next, when you unlock your phone, you'll notice you're back to the homescreen, open task manager and select the watchface app to bring up the settings again. You can now customize the lockscreen widget.
title: Can't figure out how to change settings when used in lockscreen (EDIT)

author: Donald Pascale
comment: Decent app, looks good, keeps telling me that certain features are for 'donators' only, but there isn't a way to donate that I can see.

author: Marc Joseph Gerland Marasigan
comment: No use in replying to +Dustin Yaney. He's just an idiotic spoiled brat. Looking forward for more watch faces from you.
title: Works great.

author: Nicholas Ovens
comment: I use it on my phone screen as a widget but cannot use it on my Gear 2 due to a  different OS. It's a shame that I can't but still an awesome product.

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: Gear 2 is not an android wear device. It is normal it doesn't work with it. It is clearly explained in the description.

title: No Gear 2 support (revised)

author: Mike Kearney
comment: Won't connect with my wear...no other apps have this issue.

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: Have you tried to uninstall and reinstall it? Sometime installation may not work very well.

title: Love the idea of this app, but...

comment: I rarely do ingress but really like the way it looks on my sw3. Adding some more colors would be cool.

reply.content: That's strange. Have you tried to uninstall and reinstall the app?

author: Tristin Leonard
comment: Gotta sport the team and this clock is an awesome way to do it and to know how close to checkpoint you are
title: Love this clock

author: Kalwinder Singh Dhindsa
comment: Can you explain what the bars at the bottom signify? Thanks for the Reply.

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: It's the regional check point and cycle timers. For more information about that, check this link: https://support.google.com/ingress/answer/4498575?hl=en

title: Very Good

author: Anthony Segar
comment: Aren't those Gear 2 watches in the picture?

reply.author: TRIGONE
reply.content: Supporting the gear 2 requires to completely write a new app, and I don't have enough free time to do that. Furthermore, I don't have a Samsung watch to test it. Sorry.
